amendment.description: Amendment strikes section 3 of H.Res. 577 and inserts at the end of H.Res. 576 a new text striking all after the resolving clause and striking the preamble.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scanlon amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: On ordering the previous question on the amendment (A001) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 227 - 191 (Roll no. 542).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Scanlon.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Scanlon amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Scanlon amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
